entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI Omnibus 2004/5. Social-political attitudes in Hungary among the adult population.

entry.dcterms:description: 1. Public judgement of the current political situation 2. Public opinion about the perception of inflation 3. Saving habits in foreign currencies among Hungarian population. 4. Social characteristics of those applying for preferential housing credit subsidised by the state 5. Relationship network and migration willingness among the adult population 6. Comparison of Hungarian and foreign petrol prices among the Hungarian car-owners 7. Survey of the public consumption of mobile phone and broadcasting services

face-to-face interview
